channel.title: U-Rune server development
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i44.tinypic.com/flvmmv.png[/img][/center] [center][size=8pt]This server is based off of Devolution 7.8[/size][/center]
[center][size=8pt]For the most part, I haven't really done anything massive to the server yet, I've just been working on the small parts of the server and perfecting stuff.[/size][/center]
Added an Information Manual to help some people. Added an Update Manual so people know what the latest updates are. Hans now teleports you from city to city (Only 5 different cities as shown in the pictures down below) Added a Santa Claus for the luls. It entertains me. The Lumbridge Guide gives [b]one[/b] backup starter kit, so people can have at least something to use when they die and lose their stuff. Added shitty Godsword specials, not sure why. All NPCs walk. Added perfect alching, thanks to primadude. I added my own Firemaking and Fletching. I 'fixed' Woodcutting, the emote wasn't looping. Server doesn't use [i]teleportToX[/i] and [i]teleportToY[/i] it now uses [i]teleportTo(xcoord, xcoord, height);[/i], much more efficient. Baraek gives a free Instruction manual or a free Update manual, you may have as many as you'd like. I'm working on skill menus.
Now for the part you only came to the topic to look at, pictures.
[center][img]http://i41.tinypic.com/519a2w.png[/img]
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/4ranis.png[/img]
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2yjrpu9.png[/img]
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/214v9f8.png[/img]
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2e3ogwl.png[/img]
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/10deck3.png[/img]
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/20fs3s4.png[/img]
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/29vgc2c.gif]Skill menus[/img][/center]
[center]Credits
Jagex, `Rich, Primadude, Bakatool, Killamess[/center]
[center][size=8pt]Obviously, if I'm missing any credits, please alert me and I'll adjust it accordingly.[/size][/center]

item.title: U-Rune server development
item.dc:creator: @D_T_55 D T 55

@D_T_55 wrote:

that’s one mighty fine source you got there :). don’t give up.

item.title: U-Rune server development
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:10, topic:256573"]How come you’re making them talk to the Lumbridge guide to receive their starter kit instead of giving it to them on there first login?

Then you can make the guide give help, such as where you can train, how you can get items, etc.[/quote]

The Lumbridge Guide gives a backup, just in case they somehow lose their items.

Edit: I updated the picture.

benscape:

How would you code an instrucion manual? It’d be cool to have this on my server due to having new players asking too many players, i’d like to note im using your blank server as my server base the rest im adding myself

In packet 122.

if (ItemID == *) { //Whatever you want }

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

I think your getting more props, than you should but that’s just me… My standards are incredibly high…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 15, 2009, 01:03:22 pm[/size][hr][quote="`Rich, post:10, topic:256573"]How come you’re making them talk to the Lumbridge guide to receive their starter kit instead of giving it to them on there first login?

Then you can make the guide give help, such as where you can train, how you can get items, etc.[/quote]
Tbh If you can program you can do both…

item.title: U-Rune server development
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

How come you’re making them talk to the Lumbridge guide to receive their starter kit instead of giving it to them on there first login?

Then you can make the guide give help, such as where you can train, how you can get items, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: U-Rune server development
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[center][/center]
[center][size=8pt]This server is based off of Devolution 7.8[/size][/center]

[center][size=8pt]For the most part, I haven’t really done anything massive to the server yet, I’ve just been working on the small parts of the server and perfecting stuff.[/size][/center]

Added an Information Manual to help some people.
Added an Update Manual so people know what the latest updates are.
Hans now teleports you from city to city (Only 5 different cities as shown in the pictures down below)
Added a Santa Claus for the luls. It entertains me.
The Lumbridge Guide gives one backup starter kit, so people can have at least something to use when they die and lose their stuff.
Added shitty Godsword specials, not sure why.
All NPCs walk.
Added perfect alching, thanks to primadude.
I added my own Firemaking and Fletching.
I ‘fixed’ Woodcutting, the emote wasn’t looping.
Server doesn’t use teleportToX and teleportToY it now uses teleportTo(xcoord, xcoord, height);, much more efficient.
Baraek gives a free Instruction manual or a free Update manual, you may have as many as you’d like.
I’m working on skill menus.

Now for the part you only came to the topic to look at, pictures.
